title: Internet service provider market share in Vietnam fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
Company VNPT has the highest Market share and Others has the lowest Market share.
The highest Company VNPT has 50.0 more Market share than the lowest Company Others.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share is highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.

max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.
Company FPT Telecom has the second highest value for Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 50.0.
Company VNPT is higher than any other Companys with value 56.6, followed by FPT Telecom, and Viettel. Down to Company Others with the lowest value 6.6.
The Company Others tends to be 2.26 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 100.0.
